name: Maids Revenge
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Game Jam #24, this is my first game jam so the game isn't anything award winning but hopefully you'll get a few minutes of entertainment from it.

Controls are in the top right corner when playing, I recommend playing in fullscreen.

Click on items to steal them, there are some hidden endings if you collect the right items. The timer pauses when you steal and item.

All assets except for the main character sprites were made by me.

Maid Sprites: https://www.pinterest.ca/pin/771945192361966370/
